subSections.title: Translingual
subSections.text: {{Han simplified forms|經|経|经}}

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: {{Han simp|經|f=巠|t=圣}}. Also a Japanese shinjitai. Current form {{Han compound|糸|圣}}, but not etymologically related to [[圣]].

subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text: {{Han char|rn=120|rad=糸|as=05|sn=11|four=|canj=VFEG|ids=⿰糹圣}}

subSections.title: Derived terms
Proper noun
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|けい|yomi=o}}

From {{bor|ja|ltc|-}} {{ltc-l|經}}. The ''{{ll|ja|漢音|kan'on}}'' reading, so likely a later borrowing.
